title: New: Isles – Bayview (Demo)
body:
As with their debut track _National Seashore_, Pensacola outfit **Isles** make sure to reiterate the point that these songs are very much works in progress, and by no means the finished product.

Fairly impressive really when you consider the standard they’ve already set with these initial two demos. Whilst [_National Seashore_](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/14413-new-isles-national-seashore-demo/) cut an upbeat, sensual figure, _Bayview_ is a more reserved affair, utilizing the layered vocals to sublime effect. It may still be early days for **Isles**, but these couple of outings suggest that they have a mightily exciting future ahead of them.
